_header: Cecelia is as much to say
Subjects: saints’ lives; Cecilia, saint, life of
_description: Osbern Bokenham, Life of St Cecilia — in various verse forms

BLAru327.First Lines:
Cycile ys as mych to seyeAs lylye of heuene or to þe blynd
                    weye…
BLAru327.Last Lines:
…And he shal forth passyn from þis owtlauryWyth you in
                    heuene he may be myry
BLAru327.Attributed Author:
Translated into englys be a doctor of dyuyinte clepyd Osbern
                    Bokenam…Wrytyn in Cambryge by hys sonn ffrer Thomas Burgh (index, f.
                    193)
BLAru327.Attributed Title:
The prologue of seynt Cycylys lyf (rubric, f. 134v) And seynt
                    Cecilye (index, f. 193)
